brainly_data.question:
How is the lever used in modern society? 

A. It’s used in astronomy to track the path of the stars. 
B. It’s used in construction to lift weights. 
C. It’s used in the medical field to perform surgeries. 
D. It’s used in literary courses to explain difficult ideas. 
E. It’s used in large cities to transport water to villages.
brainly_data.subject: History

A. It’s used in astronomy to track the path of the stars.

all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: B levers are used to lift heavy objects, and construction is an example. :)
